Sentencas: The effect of high-temperature aging for 4800 h at a temperature of 1123 K on the crystal structure and the conductivity of (ZrO2)(0.90)(Sc2O3)(0.09)(Yb2O3)(0.01) and (ZrO2)(0.90)(Sc2O3)(0.08)(Yb2O3)(0.02) single-crystal membranes were studied.
Titulo: Long-Term Conductivity Stability of Electrolytic Membranes of Scandia Stabilized Zirconia Co-Doped with Ytterbia

Sentencas: Such membrane lifetime testing is critical to the operation of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Long-Term Conductivity Stability of Electrolytic Membranes of Scandia Stabilized Zirconia Co-Doped with Ytterbia

Sentencas: The crystals were obtained by the method of directional crystallization of the melt in a cold crucible.
Titulo: Long-Term Conductivity Stability of Electrolytic Membranes of Scandia Stabilized Zirconia Co-Doped with Ytterbia

Sentencas: The phase composition and structure of the membranes before and after aging were studied using X-ray diffraction and Raman spectroscopy.

Sentencas: The (ZrO2)(0.90)(Sc2O3)(0.09)(Yb2O3)(0.01) composition showed long-term conductivity stability (conductivity degradation not more than 4%).

Sentencas: The (ZrO2)(0.90)(Sc2O3)(0.09)(Yb2O3)(0.01) composition can be considered a promising material for practical use as a solid electrolyte in SOFCs.
